Combine Mangal networks.

Source: R/combine_mgNetworks.R
combine_mgNetworks.Rd

Combine mgNetworksCollection and mgNetwork objects into a mgNetworksCollection object.

combine_mgNetworks(...)

Arguments

...

objects of class mgNetworksCollection or mgNetwork or a list #' of objects of these classes.

Value

An object of class mgNetworksCollection

Examples

mg_19 <- get_collection(search_networks(list(dataset_id = 19)))
#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Found 1 networks
#> Processing id: 83 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 19 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 19 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

mg_lagoon <- get_collection(search_datasets(query='lagoon%'))
#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Found 2 datasets
#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 22 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 53 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 86 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 50%   

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 22 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 22 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 927 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 52 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 53 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 926 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Data retrieval 100%   

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 52 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

#> Processing id: 53 	1/1  

#>                                                                              

combine_mgNetworks(mg_19, mg_lagoon)
#> A collection of 4 networks
#> 
#> * Network #83 from data set #19
#> * Description: 1
#> * Includes 42 edges and 24 nodes 
#> * Current taxonomic IDs coverage for nodes of this network: 
#>   --> ITIS: 79%, BOLD: 79%, EOL: 75%, COL: 75%, GBIF: 38%, NCBI: 75%
#> * Published in ref #19 DOI:10.1126/science.157.3795.1381
#> 
#> * Network #86 from data set #22
#> * Description: 1
#> * Includes 189 edges and 26 nodes 
#> * Current taxonomic IDs coverage for nodes of this network: 
#>   --> ITIS: 81%, BOLD: 81%, EOL: 85%, COL: 81%, GBIF: 0%, NCBI: 85%
#> * Published in ref #22 DOI:10.1016/s0272-7714(02)00410-9
#> 
#> * Network #927 from data set #52
#> * Description: 1
#> * Includes 27 edges and 11 nodes 
#> * Current taxonomic IDs coverage for nodes of this network: 
#>   --> ITIS: 45%, BOLD: 45%, EOL: 45%, COL: 45%, GBIF: 18%, NCBI: 45%
#> * Published in ref #53 DOI:NA
#> 
#> * Network #926 from data set #52
#> * Description: 1
#> * Includes 34 edges and 13 nodes 
#> * Current taxonomic IDs coverage for nodes of this network: 
#>   --> ITIS: 54%, BOLD: 54%, EOL: 54%, COL: 54%, GBIF: 15%, NCBI: 54%
#> * Published in ref #53 DOI:NA
#>
